MS MCQs

    Use dimensions in your financial reports in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. If you want to use dimensions other than the two global dimensions in an account schedule, what must you do?

      Set up an Analysis View with the required dimensions and assign it to an account schedule.

      Assign the dimensions on the Account Schedule Matrix page.

      Set up Account Schedule Dimensions.

      Nothing. By default, all the dimensions are available in an account schedule.


    2. Which of the following statements about the G/L Balance by Dimension analysis report is true?

      The G/L Balance by Dimension analysis report only shows income statement G/L accounts.

      Only the two global dimensions can be displayed in the analysis report by using the Show as Lines and Show as Columns fields.

      The G/L Balance by Dimension analysis report is always displayed by month.

      The G/L Balance by Dimension analysis report only shows G/L Accounts that have the account type Posting.


    3. Why is it necessary to run the update function for an analysis view?

      To update any changes in dimension values for the dimensions that are assigned to the analysis view.

      To create new analysis view entries based on the G/L entries, budget entries, and the dimensions that are assigned to the analysis view.

      To update the analysis view with new G/L accounts that have been created since the previous update.

      To export the analysis view to Excel.
